title: MaYi
name: Liu Cheng
summary: My name is Liu Cheng and you could call me MaYi. I am an enthusiastic and self-motivated Front End Web developer which have 4 year+ commercial experience in developing mid to large-scale websites, web application and desktop&mobile application based on the latest technologies like React, Electron, React Native, Grails. I'm living in Wuhan, China and currently working at Wiredcraft Co. Ltd. in Shanghai, China.
If you wish to find out more about me, you could email me at liucheng@flyingant.me or visit the following links (LinkedIn, GitHub).
